articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Ireland host Scotland with the Six Nations title up for grabs.
articles.title: Six Nations: Build-up as title favourites Ireland host Scotland

articles.description: Watch live and follow text updates as Manchester City host Newcastle in the FA Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Watch FA Cup quarter-final: Man City v Newcastle - team news & build-up

articles.description: Italy beat Wales in Cardiff to achieve their most successful Six Nations and consign their hosts to their first Wooden Spoon in 21 years.
articles.title: Italy consign Wales to first Wooden Spoon in 21 years

articles.description: Watch Final Score and follow text updates as Burnley host Brentford and Luton face Nottingham Forest in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League build-up: Burnley host Brentford, Luton face Nottm Forest

articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage of Saturday's SPFL action, with Celtic targeting top spot in the Premiership.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Build-up to five matches as Celtic eye top spot

articles.description: Coventry score a 100th-minute winner to stun Wolves and win an FA Cup classic to reach the semi-finals for the first time since 1987.
articles.title: Coventry beat Wolves in FA Cup classic to reach semis

articles.description: Aston Villa survive a late Everton comeback to end their two-match winless run with a victory at Walton Hall Park in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: Villa hold off late comeback to win at Everton

articles.description: Follow action from the Championship, with Ipswich v Sheffield Wednesday one of eight games at 15:00 GMT.
articles.title: Championship: Eight games at 15:00 GMT, including Ipswich v Sheff Wed

articles.description: Liam Cullen and Jamal Lowe score as Swansea reaffirm their recent domination of the south Wales derby against Cardiff City.
articles.title: Cullen and Lowe seal Swansea win against Cardiff

articles.description: Maria Sakkari beats US Open champion Coco Gauff to set up an Indian Wells final against world number one Iga Swiatek.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Maria Sakkari beats Coco Gauff to reach final against Iga Swiatek
